channel.title: Dueling!
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I am using a devolution 7.0 server and was just wondering how to make the right-click option for duel only appear in a certain area. I've experimented but i always get an error or my runserver.cmd will say "stack empty".
All help is appreciated!
Thanx :)

item.title: Dueling!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Well i’d really like it not to show when you cant do it, liek the attack option, no-one wants it in an area thye cant attack. hmm i was wondering instead of this how could you make it so when you accept a duel request and click the last accept button you are teleported somewhere? Not to exact co ords, but make it teleport you to a random place within a set area and make the other player teleport 1 grid away?

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling!
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Why not just make it so you can’t duel request a player if they aren’t in the duel arena using the duelPlayer method?

Read full topic
